name: 2022.02.07 - Digging and talking depression in Orange Farm
description:
This is from The Orange Farm Human Rights Advice Centre and its founder Comrade Bricks Mokolo. It shows the activities of the centre and features a discussion of how to approach people with depression in the area. 

This was filmed in Orange Farm, a settlement 50km outside of Johannesburg.

The ambition of One Minute is to help journalists for free to produce reliable, exciting news in their own languages.

https://twitter.com/OneMinuteAfrica
